message: First Week starting working with #AngularJS , and i can say it's pretty simple amazing & genius framework, really i feel in love with this awesome framework, any good resources (books names, blogs, videos, ...etc) for medium and advanced level will be appreciated :)

data.message:
Same here, it's really amazing.Check this out

http://hackr.io/tutorials/angular-js
Can it completely replace jQuery in your opinion? Or are they meant for different situations/tasks?

Both were created to handle different tasks. I don't think it's smart to compare both libraries. Angular was created to take HTML to the next step, it's amazing with data binding and much much more.

AngularJS even has something called jQueryLite that offers most of the jQuery functionalities (like .addClass/On/change/ ... ) !

You can compare AngularJS to libraries like React or Ember.
